ComicInfo.Summary: X-Tremes!: SHIELD contacts Clay and tells him to kill the Hulk. A man watches the Hulk turn into Banner and, hoping for a reward, calls X-Factor for help. X-Factor battles the Hulk and, once they put the monster on ice, decide to call SHIELD at Gamma Base.
ComicInfo.Tags: S.H.I.E.L.D. Executive Board of Directors,S.H.I.E.L.D.,Clay Quartermain,Hulk,Jean Grey,X-Factor,New Mexico,Rick Jones,Gamma Base,Illinois,Skids,Cyclops,Iceman
ComicInfo.Title: X-Tremes!
